subject: Esperanto
description: Three-goal curriculum for beginner Esperanto learners

goals.title: Introduce Yourself and Daily Routine
goals.description: Learn to greet, introduce yourself, and describe daily activities in simple present tense

goals.title: Accusative Case and Direct Objects
goals.description: Master the -n ending for direct objects and construct more complex sentences

goals.title: Asking Questions and Giving Directions
goals.description: Use question words (kiu, kio, kie, kiam), prepositions, and imperative forms

lessons.title: Personal Pronouns and Greetings
lessons.description: Learn mi, vi, li, ŝi, ĝi, ni, vi (plural), ili and basic greetings

lessons.title: Present Tense Verbs (-as ending)
source_references: grammar.txt: Verb conjugation - present tense section

lessons.title: Common Daily Verbs
lessons.description: Learn: labori (work), studi (study), manĝi (eat), dormi (sleep), lerni (learn)

lessons.title: Review: Combining Pronouns, Verbs, and Sentences
lessons.description: Practice: Mi laboras. Vi studas. Li dormas. (No new concepts, combine known elements)

lessons.title: Test: Describe Your Daily Routine
lessons.description: Write 5 sentences introducing yourself and describing three daily activities
lessons.passing_criteria: All sentences grammatically correct, all required verbs conjugated properly

lessons.title: Accusative Case (-n ending)
lessons.description: Learn -n suffix for direct objects: Mi manĝas pomon (I eat an apple)

lessons.title: Object-Taking Verbs
lessons.description: Learn: vidi (see), manĝi (eat), lerni (learn), skribi (write) with accusative objects

lessons.title: Review: Sentences with Direct Objects
lessons.description: Practice: Mi vidas hundon. Vi manĝas pomon. Ŝi skribas leteron.

lessons.title: Test: Build Complex Sentences
lessons.description: Write 5 sentences using pronouns, present tense verbs, and accusative objects
lessons.passing_criteria: All -n endings used correctly on direct objects

lessons.title: Question Words (Kiu, Kio, Kie, Kiam)
lessons.description: Learn: kiu (who), kio (what), kie (where), kiam (when) and question formation

lessons.title: Prepositions and Location
lessons.description: Learn: en (in), sur (on), ĉe (at), antaŭ (before), post (after)

lessons.title: Review: Questions and Directions
lessons.description: Practice: Kie estas la stacidomo? Kio estas en la borso? Kie laboras vi?

lessons.title: Test: Ask and Answer Questions
lessons.description: Write 5 questions about locations and daily activities, then answer them
lessons.passing_criteria: All question words used correctly, prepositions placed properly
